title: OktaAppTemplate
description:
A base model class that provides additional helper methods and
configurations for other models used in IAMbic.

expires_at.title: Expiresat
expires_at.description: The date and time the resource will be/was set to deleted.It can be a string representing a date and time, a datetime.datetime object, or a datetime.date object.

deleted.title: Deleted
deleted.description: Denotes whether the resource has been removed from AWS.Upon being set to true, the resource will be deleted the next time iambic is ran.

expires_at_default.title: Expiresatdefault
expires_at_default.description: The date and time the resource will be/was set to deleted.It can be a string representing a date and time, a datetime.datetime object, or a datetime.date object.

iambic_managed.description: Controls the directionality of Iambic changes

idp_name.title: Idpname
idp_name.description: Name of the identity provider that's associated with the group

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique ID for the app. This value is imported by IAMbic, and doesn't need to be manually set.
